meta.content: Jeopardy Archive Lisa Lyons Bing Huo Joey Falco Final clue response question answer Daily Double

meta.name: description
meta.content: An archive of clues and players for Jeopardy! show #6350.

td.p: Lisa Lyons, a social media consultant from Van Nuys, California
Bing Huo, a mechanical engineer from Sunnyvale, California
Joey Falco, a writer from Santa Monica, California (whose 3-day cash winnings total $53,999)

tr.td: HE SIGNED THE DECLARATION OF INDEPENDENCE
WORD UP
CURRENT MUSIC (GET IT?)
"J" FOOD & DRINK
I'M TAKING FRENCH LEAVE
HERALDRY
